models.name: Analytics-event
indexes: AnalyticsEventSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, createdAt: -1 })

models.name: Kleem-missing-response
indexes: KleemMissingResponseSchema.index({ channel: 1, createdAt: -1 })
KleemMissingResponseSchema.index({ resolved: 1, createdAt: -1 })
KleemMissingResponseSchema.index({ sessionId: 1 })
KleemMissingResponseSchema.index({ customerId: 1 })

models.name: Missing-response
indexes: MissingResponseSchema.index({ merchant: 1, createdAt: -1 })
MissingResponseSchema.index({ merchant: 1, resolved: 1, createdAt: -1 })
MissingResponseSchema.index({ merchant: 1, channel: 1, createdAt: -1 })
MissingResponseSchema.index({ merchant: 1, type: 1, createdAt: -1 })

models.name: Category
indexes:
CategorySchema.index(
  { merchantId: 1, parent: 1, slug: 1 },
  { unique: true, background: true },
)

models.name: Channel
indexes: ChannelSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, provider: 1, status: 1 })

ChannelSchema.index(
  { merchantId: 1, provider: 1, isDefault: 1 },
  { unique: true, partialFilterExpression: { isDefault: true, deletedAt: null } },
)
ChannelSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, provider: 1, deletedAt: 1 })

models.name: Faq
indexes: FaqSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, status: 1, createdAt: -1 })

models.name: Integration
indexes: IntegrationSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, provider: 1 }, { unique: true })

models.name: Source-url
indexes: SourceUrlSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, url: 1 }, { unique: true })

models.name: Lead
indexes: LeadSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, phoneNormalized: 1 })
LeadSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, sessionId: 1 })

models.name: Merchant
indexes: MerchantSchema.index({ userId: 1 }, { unique: true, background: true })
MerchantSchema.index({ publicSlug: 1 }, { unique: true, background: true })

models.name: Message
indexes:
MessageSessionSchema.index(
  { merchantId: 1, channel: 1, sessionId: 1 },
  { unique: true, name: 'uniq_merchant_channel_session' },
)
MessageSessionSchema.index({ createdAt: -1 })

models.name: Notification
indexes: NotificationSchema.index({ userId: 1, read: 1, createdAt: -1 })

models.name: Order
indexes:
OrderSchema.index(
  { merchantId: 1, externalId: 1 },
  { unique: true, sparse: true, background: true },
)

models.name: Plan
indexes: PlanSchema.index({ name: 1 }, { unique: true, background: true })

models.name: Product
indexes:
ProductSchema.index(
  {
    merchantId: 1,
    category: 1,
    status: 1,
    isAvailable: 1,
    createdAt: -1,
    _id: -1,
  },
  { background: true },
)

ProductSchema.index(
  {
    merchantId: 1,
    'offer.enabled': 1,
    'offer.startAt': 1,
    'offer.endAt': 1,
    createdAt: -1,
    _id: -1,
  },
  { background: true },
)

ProductSchema.index(
  { uniqueKey: 1 },
  { unique: true, sparse: true, background: true },
)
ProductSchema.index({ slug: 1 }, { sparse: true, background: true })

models.name: Support-ticket
indexes:
SupportTicketSchema.index(
  { ticketNumber: 1 },
  { unique: true, background: true },
)

models.name: Usage-counter
indexes: UsageCounterSchema.index({ merchantId: 1, monthKey: 1 }, { unique: true })

models.name: User
indexes: UserSchema.index({ email: 1 }, { unique: true, background: true })
UserSchema.index({ active: 1, createdAt: -1, _id: -1 }, { background: true })

models.name: Incoming-event
indexes:
IncomingEventSchema.index(
  { merchantId: 1, channel: 1, platformMessageId: 1 },
  { unique: true },
)

models.name: BotChats
indexes: BotChatSessionSchema.index({ sessionId: 1 }, { unique: true })
BotChatSessionSchema.index({ updatedAt: -1 })

models.name: BotFaq
indexes: BotFaqSchema.index({ status: 1, updatedAt: -1 })

models.name: BotPrompt
indexes: BotPromptSchema.index({ type: 1, active: 1 })
BotPromptSchema.index({ archived: 1, updatedAt: -1 })
